author: Reuters Editorial
title: Xiamen King Long Motor's President Resigns, Plans Debt-Financing Instruments
text:
March 30 (Reuters) - Xiamen King Long Motor Group Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT PLANS TO ISSUE UP TO 4.5 BILLION YUAN ($716.69 million) DEBT-FINANCING INSTRUMENTS
* SAYS PRESIDENT XIE SIYU RESIGNS DUE TO CHANGE IN JOB ROLE
* SAYS IT PLANS TO ISSUE ASSET-BACKED SECURITIES WORTH UP TO 1.5 BILLION YUAN Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2IhFrcV ; bit.ly/2GplNLD ; bit.ly/2pS5WyI Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2789 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
